name: Captain
otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Captain points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
ability: Each night*, choose a player other than yourself. If that player dies tonight, you re-awake & may choose another player to die instead.

name: Privateer
otherNightReminder: The Privateer points to two players. If they are different alignments, the Privateer dies.
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself). If they are different alignments, you die.

name: Old Seadog
firstNightReminder: Show 3 arbitrary character tokens not in play. Show 2 arbitrary character tokens in play.
ability: You start knowing 5 characters: 3 not in play & 2 in play.

name: Buccaneer
otherNightReminder: If Buccaneer was correct today, no-one can die tonight.
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly guess an alive player’s character. If correct, no-one can die tonight.

name: First Mate
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of in-play characters’ names contain that letter.
ability: On your 1st night, choose ‘R’, ‘I’ or ‘C’. Learn how many in-play characters’ names contain that letter.

name: Gunner
otherNightReminder: The Gunner points to a player who nominated today. If that player is a Minion, the Gunner dies.
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player who nominated today. If they are a Minion, they die.

name: Powder Monkey
firstNightReminder: If the Powder Monkey used their ability to target a Minion today: the Powder Monkey and that minion both die tonight.
ability: On your 1st day, publicly choose 2 players. If either is a Minion: you & they die tonight.

name: Landlubber
otherNightReminder: If the Landlubber nominated a Minion today: the Landlubber dies.
ability: Each night*, if you nominated a Minion for the 1st time today, you die.

name: Surgeon
otherNightReminder: If the Surgeon was nominated today and not executed: mark the player that made that nomination 'Protected'.
ability: Each night*, if a player nominated you & you were not executed today, they are safe from the Demon.

name: Cook
firstNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected and is now poisoned. Mark that player 'Poisoned'. The Cook points to a player different from the previous night. Mark that player 'Protected'.
otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected and is now poisoned. Mark that player 'Poisoned'. The Cook points to a player different from the previous night. Mark that player 'Protected'.
ability: Each night choose a player (not the same as last night): they are safe from the Demon tonight. The player you last protected is poisoned tonight.

name: Navigator
firstNightReminder: Point to 1 Townsfolk, 1 Outsider, and 1 Minion. The pointing order is arbitrary.
ability: You start knowing 3 players: 1 a Townsfolk; 1 an Outsider; & 1 a Minion. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Boatswain
otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a evil player nominated or made a nomination today. Place the 'Evil Nom' marker (remove 'Evil Nom', if any).
ability: Each night*, learn whether an evil player nominated or was nominated yesterday.

name: Wench
firstNightReminder: Wake the Wench if a player would die, but does not because of an ability.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Wench if a player would die, but does not because of an ability.
ability: You wake after any player would die, but doesn’t because of an ability.

name: Smuggler
firstNightReminder: If the Smuggler died at night, they point to a player. Then they choose a Townsfolk character. If that player not the Demon: they become the chosen Townsfolk character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment.
otherNightReminder: If the Smuggler died at night, they point to a player. Then they choose a Townsfolk character. If that player not the Demon: they become the chosen Townsfolk character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment.
ability: If you die at night, choose a player & a Townsfolk: if not the Demon, they become that Townsfolk.

name: Hermit
firstNightReminder: If the Hermit was nominated today, they cannot die tonight
ability: If you are “mad” about being an Hermit, you might be executed. You cannot die at night if you were nominated the previous day. If only 4 players are alive & you’ve never been nominated: good wins.

name: Barnacle
firstNightReminder: Show the Barnacle the arbitrary Demon player. If the token received by the Baranacle is a Minon that would wake tonight: Allow the Barnacle to do the Minion actions. Place their markers. Wake the Demon. Show them the Barnacle player. If the Barnacle targets players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Barnacle markers.
otherNightReminder: Allow the Barnacle to do the actions of the Minion. Place their markers. If the Barnacle selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Barnacle markers.
ability: You think you are a Minion, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

name: Mad Fiddler
firstNightReminder: The Mad Fiddler points to a living player. That player is drunk until they nominate.
otherNightReminder: The Mad Fiddler points to a living player. That player is drunk until they nominate.
ability: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed. Each night, chose an alive player. That player is drunk until they make a nomination.

name: Mermaid
otherNightReminder: Raise hand.
ability: Each night*, raise your hand. If the Demon chooses you: they die & you become the evil Demon.

name: Stowaway
otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion woke tonight.
ability: Each night*,  learn if a Minon woke tonight. You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon.

name: Voodoo Priestess
otherNightReminder: Wake both swapped players to inform them of their new role if an evil player nominated a Demon.
ability: Twice per game, when an evil player nominates a Demon, you & that Demon swap characters.

name: Undead Pirate
otherNightReminder: The Undead Pirate either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a neighbor player. That player dies.
ability: The 1st time you die: you live, but register as dead. Once per game at night*, choose a neighbor: they die.

name: Sea Spirit
firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to marked player.
ability: You start knowing who is a particular Townsfolk. If only that Townsfolk, the Demon, & you live: evil wins.

name: Flesh-Eater
otherNightReminder: If an nominated player was executed today: The Flesh-Eater points to a player. That player dies.
ability: Each night*, if you nominated a player who was executed today, choose a player: they die.

name: Davy Jones
otherNightReminder: The Davy Jones points to a player. If that player dies tonight: that player is poisoned instead and dies the following night.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they die tonight, they are instead poisoned & die the following night.

name: Kraken
otherNightReminder: The Kraken points to a player. That player dies. If there were even nominations today the Kraken points at 2 players instead.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If there were even nominations today, instead choose 2 players tonight.

name: Calypso
otherNightReminder: The Calypso points to a Townsfolk character on the sheet. If that character is in play, point to that player. Calypso points to that player’s neighbor. That neighbor dies.
ability: Each night*, choose a Townsfolk: If in play, you learn who they are. Choose that Townsfolk’s neighbor: they die.

name: Rusalka
firstNightReminder: The Rusalka points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow, they die that night.
otherNightReminder: The Rusalka points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow, they die that night.
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die that night. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead. Each day, if no-one is nominated, evil wins.
